messages.subject: Re: Rich T 	voice from the wilderness
messages.msgSnippet: ... david, you may call me a thing, but don t call me old............... Glad you see what i see. Hate to be the only one out in the wilderness. milt
messages.messageBody:
--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "David Zincavage" <jdz@u...> wrote:
>
> I voted with you, Milt, old thing. See the message board.
>
> DZ

david,
you may call me a thing, but don't call me old...............

Glad you see what i see. Hate to be the only one out in the wilderness.

milt
